So do you know what Inception means? So Inception 
is the origin or starting point of something.

So just to give you an example I've been the 
CMO of Real Life English since its inception.

Now in this movie however, they use it to 
mean to implant an idea into someone's mind

through their dreams. So without even 
realizing it when this person wakes up,

they have this new idea that they think is 
completely their own. So perhaps it's called

Inception because it's about implanting that 
origin of the idea into that person subconscious.
